Flow Instrumentation Edition | October 15, 2014
Confidential & Proprietary
Two Key Players Added to Flow Instrumentation Sales Team We are pleased to announce the addition of two new Strategic Accounts Managers to the Flow Instrumentation team: Rick Heidvogel and Randy Tyler. Along with the previously announced appointments of Greg Gomez and John Huff, Rick and Randy will be key contributors as we continue to strengthen our Flow Instrumentation business. Rick Heidvogel Strategic Accounts Manager Rick recently joined Badger Meter with an extensive sales management background in irrigation management solutions in golf course, landscape, municipal and agricultural markets. Based in southeastern Wisconsin Rick will be focusing on supporting certain strategic accounts throughout the U.S. Randy Tyler Strategic Accounts Manager An expert in oilfield and mining operations with a strong background in consulting and sales management, Randy will be responsible for supporting strategic accounts, specifically in the oil and gas market. Randy is based in the Denver metropolitan area and will be focusing on accounts throughout the U.S. and Canada.
ModMAG M-Series® Stocked Item Enhancement M2000 and M4000 DC power options have been added to the mag meter stock item list. The additional stocked meters enhance our stocked offering to include the most commonly purchased models at pre-determined, shorter lead times. The revised document can be found on the extranet. Stay tuned for updates on the ModMAG stocked meter offering in future eNews messages. Download the Stocked Meter Offering Summary
